A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie wasn’t horrible on its own but in context to the other films it is horrible. So many missed opportunities with this one. Lots of irrelevant scenes.. Finn and Po story was so pointless. Snoke was uneventful and Luke’s character is basically shattered ... not sure how it’s Gunna work in episode 9 with Carrie Fisher ... overall pretty disappointing
